name: Assassin 101
description:
What is this game about?

Ever curious of how to be an assassin? Well, this course teaches you everything(nothing) it really takes to be an assassin!

Or, have fun playing as a newbie assassin on their first mission assignment! See if you can work it out on your first run!

How do I play?

Through this webpage OR through the spinoff app.

How do I support this game?

Anything could help really! Leave a like on spinoff, play the game or leave a comment down below would be nice!
